Introduction to the tydiverse

```{r}
library(gapminder)
library(dplyr)
gapminder

```
/-------FILTERING---------------------/
```{r}
gapminder %>%                         
  filter(year==1957)
```
/------------------ARRGANE-----------------------------/

```{r}

gapminder %>%
  arrange(lifeExp)

gapminder %>%
  arrange(desc(lifeExp))
```
<<<<<<< HEAD
/------------FILTER AND ARRNGE-------------------/
```{r}
gapminder %>%
  filter(year==1957) %>%
  arrange(desc(pop))

```
/-------------------THE VERB MUTATE-------------------/
```{r}
gapminder %>%
mutate(lifeExp=12 * lifeExp)
gapminder %>%
  mutate(lifeExpMonths=12*lifeExp)
```
/-----------------Combining filter, mutate and arrane------------------------/
```{r}
gapminder %>%
  filter(year==2007) %>%
  mutate(lifeExpMonths=12*lifeExp) %>%
  arrange(desc(lifeExpMonths))

```
